system.description:
You have proven to be the strongest, biggest, and most cunning of all orcs.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Orc-Boss, you must earn the Fellowship of the Orcs.

The Orc-Boss starts with Orc Smash!

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.orc-boss.Item.gnEtpaB0KPn8M7WL]{ORC SMASH!}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.orc-boss.Item.FpBpuchBFLpHLiLS]{DEFIANT TO THE LAST}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.orc-boss.Item.tjMufIYpBDAzHeSs]{EVIL'S HEART}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.orc-boss.Item.oCwxwGKNi8WuOwNC]{INFINITE STRENGTH}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.orc-boss.Item.EiKqKAWTg5nVFcjO]{SIXTH SENSE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.orc-boss.Item.lNaIW4ertYr0B4l3]{SLASH AND BURN}

advancements.name: Take the Orc's Core Moves (The Fires of Industry and Dishonor Before Death). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
